detailed_info.name: Benzyl salicylate
detailed_info.description: Benzyl salicylate is one of Europe's regulated allergens. It is naturally produced by many plants and is used as a fragrance molecule in perfumed products: it is known for its light, balsamic, even musky scents. It is also a UV absorber, helping to stabilize products. The first sun creams were produced using this ingredient, but it was abandoned as it was not very effective.
detailed_info.regulation:
The presence of the substance shall be indicated in the list of ingredients referred to in Article 19 (1) (g) when its concentration is greater:
- to 0,001% in products without rinsing
- to 0,01% in the products to be rinsed

functions.name: Uv absorber
functions.description: Protects the cosmetic product from UV-light effects
